@JohnKerry to SFRC: if we walk away from deal, partners walk away from sanctions & we squander chance to resolve this thru peaceful means.
@JohnKerry to SFRC: if we walk away from deal, partners walk away from sanctions & we squander chance to resolve this thru peaceful means.
@JohnKerry to CFR: if we don't accept this deal, year 15 comes tomorrow.
@JohnKerry to CFR: if we don't accept this deal, year 15 comes tomorrow.
@JohnKerry speaking live at CFR: first order of business, my friends, is to push back against an Iran that doesn't have a nuclear weapon.
@JohnKerry speaking live at CFR: first order of business, my friends, is to push back against an Iran that doesn't have a nuclear weapon.
@JohnKerry: with this deal, Iran limited to 300kg uranium at 3.67 percent enrichment. You cannot make a nuclear bomb at that level.
@JohnKerry: with this deal, Iran limited to 300kg uranium at 3.67 percent enrichment. You cannot make a nuclear bomb at that level.
@JohnKerry: we have a choice -- Iran able to produce a bomb now or not at all for at least 15 years.
@JohnKerry: we have a choice -- Iran able to produce a bomb now or not at all for at least 15 years.
@JohnKerry: threat of other nations in the region desiring nuclear weapons is much greater without the deal than with it.
@JohnKerry: threat of other nations in the region desiring nuclear weapons is much greater without the deal than with it.
